titleStmt.title: The description and the practice of the four most admirable beasts explained in four sermons upon Revel. 4.8 : whereof the first three were preached before the Right Honourable James, Duke of Ormond, and lord lieutenant of Ireland, His Grace, and the two Houses of Parliament, and others, very honourable persons / by the Right Reverend Father in God, Gr. Lord Bishop of Ossory.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Gryffith, 1589?-1672.

titleStmt.title: The description and the practice of the four most admirable beasts explained in four sermons upon Revel. 4.8 : whereof the first three were preached before the Right Honourable James, Duke of Ormond, and lord lieutenant of Ireland, His Grace, and the two Houses of Parliament, and others, very honourable persons / by the Right Reverend Father in God, Gr. publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Roycroft, for Philemon Stephens, and are to be sold at the Golden Lion ...,

notesStmt.note: Reel 1559:43 copy bound following: A true relation of a lavv-proceeding betwixt ... Griffith, Lord Bishop of Ossory and Sir George Ayskue, Knight &c. London : Printed for the author, 1663.
